Entry.JapaneseText: なんだか、すごく悪い事をしてる 気がします……
Entry.EnglishText: Why do I get the feeling that we've done something bad...
Are you talking about how we set that flower on fire?

Entry.JapaneseText: うん……燃える花を見てると 可哀想で……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... When I see that burning flower, I feel sorry for it...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、燃やさないと、先に進めないし それに……この花、けっこう気持ち悪いヨ？
Entry.EnglishText: But if we didn't set it ablaze, we wouldn't have been able to move forward... Besides, wasn't that flower pretty creepy?
There wasn't any way around it.

Entry.JapaneseText: どんな犠牲もそうやって仕方がないで 片付けてきたんですね……
Entry.EnglishText: So you're able to justify any sacrifices made by saying that there was no way around it...
